alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Duval County through 930 PM CDT... At 902 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seven Sisters, or near Freer, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Freer and Seven Sisters. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 750 and 770. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Texas.
